trans-unit.source: Represents a set of data commands and a connection to a database that are used to fill the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and update the database.
trans-unit.target: Representa um conjunto de comandos de dados e uma ligação a uma base de dados que são utilizados para preencher o <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> e atualizar a base de dados.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo foi preterido e será removido numa versão futura do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Oracle e ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OracleDataAdapter serves as a bridge between a **DataSet** and database for retrieving and saving data.
trans-unit.target: O OracleDataAdapter funciona como uma ponte entre um **DataSet** e base de dados para obter e os dados.

trans-unit.source: The OracleDataAdapter provides this bridge by using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> to load data from the database into the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, and using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to send changes made in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> back to the data source.
trans-unit.target: O OracleDataAdapter fornece este bridge utilizando <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>ao carregar os dados da base de dados para o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>e utilizar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>para enviar as alterações efetuadas a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>novamente para a origem de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the OracleDataAdapter fills a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, it creates the necessary tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist.
trans-unit.target: Quando o OracleDataAdapter preenche um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, cria as tabelas necessárias e colunas para os dados devolvidos se estes ainda não existir.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, informações da chave primária não estão incluídas no esquema implicitamente criado, a menos que a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>.</xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may also have the OracleDataAdapter create the schema of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, including primary key information, before filling it with data using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Também poderá ter OracleDataAdapter criar o esquema do <xref:System.Data.DataSet>incluindo informações da chave primária, antes de preenchê-lo com dados utilizando o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [adicionar restrições existente para um conjunto de dados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, numeric fields imported to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> are mapped to <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Por predefinição, os campos numéricos importado para um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>com <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>estão mapeadas para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>objetos.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to overflow the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>, and throw an Oracle exception, by importing a non-integral numeric value that is either too large or too high precision for the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>'s precision limitations.
trans-unit.target: É possível capacidade excedida de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>e acionar uma excepção do Oracle, através da importação de um valor numérico não integral que é demasiado grande ou demasiado elevada precisão para a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>do limitações de precisão.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>

trans-unit.source: Refer to the description of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a descrição da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>para obter mais informações.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>

trans-unit.source: The OracleDataAdapter also includes the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and `TableMappings` properties to facilitate loading and updating of data.
trans-unit.target: O OracleDataAdapter também inclui o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, e `TableMappings` propriedades para facilitar a carregar e a atualização de dados.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support batched SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework Data Provider para Oracle não suporta batches instruções SQL.

trans-unit.source: However, it does allow you to use multiple `REF CURSOR` output parameters to fill a **DataSet**, each in its own <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, lhe permitem utilizar vários `REF CURSOR` preencher os parâmetros de saída um **DataSet**, cada no respetivo proprietário <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: You must define the parameters, mark them as output parameters, and indicate that they are `REF CURSOR` data types.
trans-unit.target: Tem de definir os parâmetros, marcá-los como parâmetros de saída e indicam que estão `REF CURSOR` tipos de dados.

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> method when the OracleDataAdapter is filled using `REF CURSOR` parameters returned by a stored procedure, because Oracle does not provide the information necessary to determine what the table name and column names are when the SQL statement is executed.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que não é possível utilizar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>método quando o OracleDataAdapter é preenchido com `REF CURSOR` parâmetros devolvidos por um procedimento armazenado, porque o Oracle não fornece as informações necessárias para determinar o que o nome da tabela e os nomes das colunas são quando a instrução SQL é executada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# example assumes that you have created this stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo seguinte c# parte do princípio de que criou este procedimento armazenado.

trans-unit.source: Create the following Oracle package on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: Crie o seguinte pacote Oracle no servidor Oracle.

trans-unit.source: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CURSPKG AS TYPE T_CURSOR IS REF CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); END CURSPKG; / ``` Create the following Oracle package body on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CURSPKG AS TYPE T_CURSOR IS REF CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); END CURSPKG; / ```Crie o corpo do pacote Oracle seguinte no servidor Oracle.

trans-unit.source: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CURSPKG AS PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR T_CURSOR; BEGIN IF N_EMPNO <> 0 THEN OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMP.EMPNO = N_EMPNO; ELSE OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO; END IF; IO_CURSOR := V_CURSOR; END OPEN_ONE_CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR1 T_CURSOR; V_CURSOR2 T_CURSOR; BEGIN OPEN V_CURSOR1 FOR SELECT * FROM EMP; OPEN V_CURSOR2 FOR SELECT * FROM DEPT; EMPCURSOR := V_CURSOR1; DEPTCURSOR := V_CURSOR2; END OPEN_TWO_CURSORS; END CURSPKG; / ``` The following C# example demonstrates how you might obtain table and column information using the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CURSPKG AS PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR T_CURSOR; BEGIN IF N_EMPNO <> 0 THEN OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMP.EMPNO = N_EMPNO; ELSE OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO; END IF; IO_CURSOR := V_CURSOR; END OPEN_ONE_CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR1 T_CURSOR; V_CURSOR2 T_CURSOR; BEGIN OPEN V_CURSOR1 FOR SELECT * FROM EMP; OPEN V_CURSOR2 FOR SELECT * FROM DEPT; EMPCURSOR := V_CURSOR1; DEPTCURSOR := V_CURSOR2; END OPEN_TWO_CURSORS; END CURSPKG; / ```O exemplo do c# seguinte demonstra como pode obter informações de tabelas e colunas utilizando o procedimento armazenado.

trans-unit.source: ```c# // GetConnectionString() returns a connection string for // the data source. string connString = GetConnectionString(); DataSet ds = new DataSet(); OracleConnection conn = new OracleConnection(connString); OracleCommand cmd = conn.CreateCommand(); cmd.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_TWO_CURSORS"; cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure; cmd.Parameters.Add("EMPCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; cmd.Parameters.Add("DEPTCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; OracleDataAdapter da = new OracleDataAdapter(cmd); da.TableMappings.Add("Table", "Emp"); da.TableMappings.Add("Table1", "Dept"); da.Fill(ds); ds.Relations.Add("EmpDept", ds.Tables["Dept"].Columns["Deptno"], ds.Tables["Emp"].Columns["Deptno"], false); ``` The following Visual Basic example demonstrates how to use an OracleDataAdapter to fill a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> using an Oracle `REF CURSOR`.
trans-unit.target: ```c# // GetConnectionString() returns a connection string for // the data source. string connString = GetConnectionString(); DataSet ds = new DataSet(); OracleConnection conn = new OracleConnection(connString); OracleCommand cmd = conn.CreateCommand(); cmd.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_TWO_CURSORS"; cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure; cmd.Parameters.Add("EMPCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; cmd.Parameters.Add("DEPTCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; OracleDataAdapter da = new OracleDataAdapter(cmd); da.TableMappings.Add("Table", "Emp"); da.TableMappings.Add("Table1", "Dept"); da.Fill(ds); ds.Relations.Add("EmpDept", ds.Tables["Dept"].Columns["Deptno"], ds.Tables["Emp"].Columns["Deptno"], false); ```O exemplo do Visual Basic seguinte demonstra como utilizar um OracleDataAdapter para preencher um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>utilizando um Oracle `REF CURSOR`.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: These examples use tables that are defined in the Oracle Scott/Tiger schema, and require the following PL/SQL package and package body.
trans-unit.target: Estes exemplos utilizam tabelas que são definidas no esquema do Oracle. o blogue/Tiger e exigem o seguinte pacote LP/SQL e o corpo do pacote.

trans-unit.source: You must create these on your server to use the examples.
trans-unit.target: Tem de criar estes no seu servidor para utilizar os exemplos.

trans-unit.source: Create the following Oracle package on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: Crie o seguinte pacote Oracle no servidor Oracle.

trans-unit.source: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CURSPKG AS TYPE T_CURSOR IS REF CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); END CURSPKG; / ``` Create the following Oracle package body on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CURSPKG AS TYPE T_CURSOR IS REF CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); END CURSPKG; / ```Crie o corpo do pacote Oracle seguinte no servidor Oracle.

trans-unit.source: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CURSPKG AS PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR T_CURSOR; BEGIN IF N_EMPNO <> 0 THEN OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMP.EMPNO = N_EMPNO; ELSE OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO; END IF; IO_CURSOR := V_CURSOR; END OPEN_ONE_CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR1 T_CURSOR; V_CURSOR2 T_CURSOR; BEGIN OPEN V_CURSOR1 FOR SELECT * FROM EMP; OPEN V_CURSOR2 FOR SELECT * FROM DEPT; EMPCURSOR := V_CURSOR1; DEPTCURSOR := V_CURSOR2; END OPEN_TWO_CURSORS; END CURSPKG; / ``` This Visual Basic example executes a PL/SQL stored procedure that returns two `REF CURSOR` parameters, and fills a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the rows that are returned.
trans-unit.target: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CURSPKG AS PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR T_CURSOR; BEGIN IF N_EMPNO <> 0 THEN OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMP.EMPNO = N_EMPNO; ELSE OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO; END IF; IO_CURSOR := V_CURSOR; END OPEN_ONE_CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR1 T_CURSOR; V_CURSOR2 T_CURSOR; BEGIN OPEN V_CURSOR1 FOR SELECT * FROM EMP; OPEN V_CURSOR2 FOR SELECT * FROM DEPT; EMPCURSOR := V_CURSOR1; DEPTCURSOR := V_CURSOR2; END OPEN_TWO_CURSORS; END CURSPKG; / ```Neste exemplo do Visual Basic executa um procedimento armazenado LP/SQL que devolve dois `REF CURSOR` parâmetros e preenche um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>com as linhas que são devolvidas.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: ```vb# ' GetConnectionString() returns a connection string for ' the data source. Dim connString As New String(GetConnectionString()) Dim ds As New DataSet() Dim conn As New OracleConnection(connString) Dim cmd As OracleCommand = conn.CreateCommand() cmd.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_TWO_CURSORS" cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure cmd.Parameters.Add("EMPCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = _ ParameterDirection.Output cmd.Parameters.Add("DEPTCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = _ ParameterDirection.Output Dim da As New OracleDataAdapter(cmd) da.TableMappings.Add("Table", "Emp") da.TableMappings.Add("Table1", "Dept") da.Fill(ds) ds.Relations.Add("EmpDept", ds.Tables("Dept").Columns("Deptno"), _ ds.Tables("Emp").Columns("Deptno"), False) ``` After using the OracleDataAdapter to perform a `Fill` or `FillSchema` operation, the `DataColumn.ReadOnly` property always returns false, regardless of whether a column can be updated or not, because the Oracle server does not return this information.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# ' GetConnectionString() returns a connection string for ' the data source. Dim connString As New String(GetConnectionString()) Dim ds As New DataSet() Dim conn As New OracleConnection(connString) Dim cmd As OracleCommand = conn.CreateCommand() cmd.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_TWO_CURSORS" cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure cmd.Parameters.Add("EMPCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = _ ParameterDirection.Output cmd.Parameters.Add("DEPTCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = _ ParameterDirection.Output Dim da As New OracleDataAdapter(cmd) da.TableMappings.Add("Table", "Emp") da.TableMappings.Add("Table1", "Dept") da.Fill(ds) ds.Relations.Add("EmpDept", ds.Tables("Dept").Columns("Deptno"), _ ds.Tables("Emp").Columns("Deptno"), False) ```Depois de utilizar o OracleDataAdapter para efetuar um `Fill` ou `FillSchema` operação, o `DataColumn.ReadOnly` propriedade sempre devolve false, independentemente se uma coluna pode ser atualizada ou não, porque o servidor Oracle não devolve estas informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, the following read/write properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma instância de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, as seguintes propriedades de leitura/escrita estão definidas para os respetivos valores predefinidos, conforme mostrado na tabela.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Default value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>|`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>|`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedades | Valor predefinido | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>| `MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>| `MissingSchemaAction.Add`| Pode alterar o valor de qualquer uma destas propriedades através de uma chamada para a propriedade separada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> class with the specified SQL SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> classe com a instrução SQL SELECT especificada.

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> constructor sets the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação do <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>conjuntos de construtor de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade para o valor especificado no `selectCommand` parâmetro.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, the following read/write properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma instância de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, as seguintes propriedades de leitura/escrita estão definidas para os respetivos valores predefinidos, conforme mostrado na tabela.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>|`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>|`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedades | Valor inicial | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>| `MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>| `MissingSchemaAction.Add`| Pode alterar o valor de qualquer uma destas propriedades através de uma chamada para a propriedade separada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> that is an SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure, and is set as the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> que é uma instrução SQL SELECT ou um procedimento armazenado e é definido como o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> class with an SQL SELECT statement and an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> classe com uma instrução SQL SELECT e um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> can be useful in an application that must call the `Fill` method for two or more <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> objects.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação do <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>pode ser útil numa aplicação que tem de chamar o `Fill` método para dois ou mais <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>objetos.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: A string that is an SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure to be used by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia que é uma instrução SQL SELECT ou o procedimento armazenado para ser utilizado pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref> that represents the connection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref> que representa a ligação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> class with an SQL SELECT statement and a connection string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> classe com uma instrução SQL SELECT e uma cadeia de ligação.

trans-unit.source: A string that is an SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure to be used by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia que é uma instrução SQL SELECT ou o procedimento armazenado para ser utilizado pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>

trans-unit.source: The connection string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de ligação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to delete records in the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma instrução SQL ou o procedimento armazenado utilizada para eliminar registos na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: When the DeleteCommand property is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade de DeleteCommand é atribuída a um criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>não está a ser clonado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the DeleteCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, DeleteCommand mantém uma referência para o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> criada anteriormente

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if DeleteCommand is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, you can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate the DeleteCommand, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the database.
trans-unit.target: Durante uma operação de atualização, se DeleteCommand não está definido e informações da chave primária não estão presentes no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>de classe para gerar automaticamente DeleteCommand e os comandos adicionais necessárias para reconciliar a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>na base de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Para tal, defina a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: A lógica de geração também necessita de informações de coluna chave estar presente no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> used during an update operation to delete records in the database that correspond to deleted rows in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> utilizada durante uma operação de atualização para eliminar registos na base de dados que correspondam a linhas eliminadas no <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to insert new records into the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma instrução SQL ou o procedimento armazenado utilizado para inserir novos registos na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: When the InsertCommand property is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade InsertCommand é atribuída a um criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto, o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>não está a ser clonado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: Instead, InsertCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, o InsertCommand mantém uma referência para o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> criada anteriormente

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if InsertCommand is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, you can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate InsertCommand, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the database.
trans-unit.target: Durante uma operação de atualização, se InsertCommand não está definido e informações da chave primária não estão presentes no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>de classe para gerar automaticamente InsertCommand e os comandos adicionais necessárias para reconciliar a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>na base de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Para tal, defina a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: A lógica de geração também necessita de informações de coluna chave estar presente no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> depending upon how you set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se a execução deste comando devolve as linhas, estas linhas podem ser adicionadas à <xref:System.Data.DataSet>consoante o modo como configurou o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When you update a column with the `LONG RAW` data type, an exception is thrown when you enter a value of `NULL` in the column.
trans-unit.target: Quando atualizar uma coluna com o `LONG RAW` tipo de dados, é emitida uma exceção ao introduzir um valor de `NULL` na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The Oracle `LONG RAW` data type is a deprecated type in Oracle version 8.0.
trans-unit.target: O Oracle `LONG RAW` tipo de dados é um tipo preterido no Oracle versão 8.0.

trans-unit.source: To avoid this error, use the `BLOB` data type instead of `LONG RAW`.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar este erro, utilize o `BLOB` do tipo de dados em vez de `LONG RAW`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> used during an update operation to insert records in the database that correspond to new rows in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> utilizada durante uma operação de atualização para inserir registos na base de dados que correspondem a novas linhas no <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during an update operation after a command is executed against the database.
trans-unit.target: Durante uma operação de atualização, ocorre depois de um comando é executado na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: When using the `Update` method, there are two events that occur per data row updated.
trans-unit.target: Ao utilizar o `Update` método, existem dois eventos que ocorrem por linha de dados atualizada.

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: A ordem de execução é o seguinte: 1.

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores existentes no <xref:System.Data.DataRow>são movidas para os valores de parâmetros.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdating` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O `OnRowUpdating` o evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: Executa o comando.

trans-unit.source: If the `UpdateRowSource` enumeration is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: Se o `UpdateRowSource` enumeração está definida como `FirstReturnedRecord`, o primeiro devolveu o resultado é colocado no **DataRow**.

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: Se existirem parâmetros de saída, estes são colocados no **DataRow**.

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdated` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O `OnRowUpdated` o evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: `AcceptChanges` is called.
trans-unit.target: `AcceptChanges`é chamado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> before a command is executed against the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>antes de ser executado um comando contra a origem de dados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: When using the `Update` method, there are two events that occur per data row updated.
trans-unit.target: Ao utilizar o `Update` método, existem dois eventos que ocorrem por linha de dados atualizada.

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: A ordem de execução é o seguinte: 1.

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores existentes no <xref:System.Data.DataRow>são movidas para os valores de parâmetros.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdating` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O `OnRowUpdating` o evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: Executa o comando.

trans-unit.source: If the `UpdateRowSource` enumeration is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: Se o `UpdateRowSource` enumeração está definida como `FirstReturnedRecord`, o primeiro devolveu o resultado é colocado no **DataRow**.

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: Se existirem parâmetros de saída, estes são colocados no **DataRow**.

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdated` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O `OnRowUpdated` o evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: `AcceptChanges` is called.
trans-unit.target: `AcceptChanges`é chamado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to select records in the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma instrução SQL ou o procedimento armazenado utilizado para selecionar registos na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: When SelectCommand is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Quando é atribuído SelectCommand para um criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>não está a ser clonado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the SelectCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, SelectCommand mantém uma referência a criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: If SelectCommand does not return any rows, no tables are added to the **DataSet**, and no exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se SelectCommand não devolver quaisquer linhas, não existem tabelas são adicionadas para o **conjunto de dados**, e não a exceção é acionada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> that is used during a fill operation to select records from database for placement in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> que é utilizada durante uma operação de preenchimento para selecionar registos da base de dados para o posicionamento no <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição deste membro, consulte <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand*>.</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand*>

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto que é uma cópia desta instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables batch processing support, and specifies the number of commands that can be executed in a batch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que ativa ou desativa o suporte de processamento em lote e especifica o número de comandos que podem ser executadas num batch.

trans-unit.source: Use the UpdateBatchSize property to update a data source with changes from a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de UpdateBatchSize para atualizar uma origem de dados com alterações de <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: This can increase application performance by reducing the number of round-trips to the server.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode aumentar o desempenho da aplicação, reduzindo o número de ida e volta ao servidor.

trans-unit.source: Executing an extremely large batch could decrease performance.
trans-unit.target: Executar um lote extremamente grande pode diminuir o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should test for the optimum batch size setting before you implement your application.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, deverá testar para a definição de tamanho de lote ideal antes de implementar a aplicação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is thrown if the value is set to a number less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>é emitida se o valor estiver definido como um número inferior a zero.</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to process per batch.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas a processar por lote.

trans-unit.source: Value:
trans-unit.target: Valor:

trans-unit.source: Effect:
trans-unit.target: Efeito:

trans-unit.source: There is no limit on the batch size.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum limite no tamanho de lote.

trans-unit.source: Disables batch updating.
trans-unit.target: Desativa a atualização do batch.

trans-unit.source: > 1
trans-unit.target: > 1

trans-unit.source: Changes are sent using batches of UpdateBatchSize operations at a time.
trans-unit.target: As alterações são enviadas através de lotes de UpdateBatchSize operações de cada vez.

trans-unit.source: When setting this to a value other than 1 all the commands associated with the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> have to have their <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputParameters" name="OutputParameters" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir este como um valor diferente de 1 todos os comandos associados a <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> tem de ter os respetivos <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource*>propriedade definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref> ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputParameters" name="OutputParameters" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource*>

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown otherwise.
trans-unit.target: É emitida uma exceção, caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to update records in the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma instrução SQL ou o procedimento armazenado utilizado para atualizar os registos na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: When UpdateCommand is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Quando UpdateCommand é atribuído a um criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>não está a ser clonado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the UpdateCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, UpdateCommand mantém uma referência a criado anteriormente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> is not set and primary key information is present in the **DataSet**, you can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the database.
trans-unit.target: Durante uma operação de atualização, se <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>não está definida e a chave primária informações estão presentes no **conjunto de dados**, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>class para gerar automaticamente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>e os comandos adicionais necessários para reconciliar a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>na base de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Para tal, defina a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: A lógica de geração também necessita de informações de coluna chave estar presente no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be merged with the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> depending upon how you set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se a execução deste comando devolve as linhas, estas linhas podem ser intercaladas com o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>consoante o modo como configurou o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When you update a column with the `LONG RAW` data type, an exception is thrown when you enter a value of `NULL` in the column.
trans-unit.target: Quando atualizar uma coluna com o `LONG RAW` tipo de dados, é emitida uma exceção ao introduzir um valor de `NULL` na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The Oracle `LONG RAW` data type is a deprecated type in Oracle version 8.0.
trans-unit.target: O Oracle `LONG RAW` tipo de dados é um tipo preterido no Oracle versão 8.0.

trans-unit.source: To avoid this error, use the `BLOB` data type instead of `LONG RAW`.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar este erro, utilize o `BLOB` do tipo de dados em vez de `LONG RAW`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> used during an update operation to update records in the database that correspond to modified rows in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> utilizada durante uma operação de atualização para atualizar os registos na base de dados que correspondam a linhas modificadas no <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.
